description.narrative: Strategic evaluations for thematic areas are conducted and results of evaluations are used in programmes and operations, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Evaluation And Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF Program of cooperation has the necessary resources (financial, human and systems) to deliver on its programme results efficiently and in a cost-effective method

sector.narrative: Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system

Afghanistan Country Programme Document 2015-2019 extended until 3/2022

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strategic evaluations for thematic areas are conducted and results of evaluations are used in programmes and operations

description.narrative: Output discontinued in 2018. | Status:Discontinued | As-of Date:07/02/2019

title.narrative: An evaluation society is in place in Afghanistan with the support from relevant stakeholders (UN, Government, NGO and academia).
